author: Xbox
description:
The dreaded Worm Cult has returned, and once more Tamriel’s adventurers will need to gather their allies, new and old, to stop the cult and their terrible plans for the isle of Solstice. Your new ESO adventure begins here! 

ESO’s 2025 Content Pass and 2025 Premium Edition are now available for purchase and include The Seasons of the Worm Cult Part 1, arriving June 18 for Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One. Pick up either edition before launch to acquire instant access to new dungeons and early rewards, including a new mount, pet, and emote pack.

author: Xbox
description:
Commandos: Origins is Out Now in Standard and Deluxe Editions—the latter including digital goodies like the soundtrack, legacy skins, and a 3D printing template of the Green Beret—on PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S. Play it day one with Game Pass. 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/commandos-origins/9nnrcr6mbndr

ALARM! The legendary real-time tactics franchise returns: Commandos: Origins brings you back to the very first missions of this infamous WWII special unit. Take over control of Green Beret, Sapper and Co, learn how they originally met, and take on more than 10 missions from the barren Arctic to the African desert.

Vampire Survivors: Emerald Diorama is available now for free on Xbox 

In a universe where a single level up choice can change everything, the SaGa: Emerald Beyond characters stand shoulder to shoulder with the Vampire Survivors, united to face their next adventure together. Will the Vampire Survivors be graced by the presence of a vampire? We doubt it, but never say never. 12+ new characters, 16+ new weapons, a multi-biome stage and more await you!

author: Xbox
description:
Duskfade is coming to Xbox Series X|S in 2026! A heartfelt tribute to the golden age of 3D action-platformers. Dynamic platforming and fast-paced combat meets an emotional story as you shatter the shackles of time to put an end to eternal night and save your sister. 

Join Zirian as you jump, dash, grapple, and glide your way through thrilling challenges that rekindle the magic of classic platformer favorites! 

Add to your wishlist now! 

https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9pj6lffjzd2m

author: Xbox
description:
Atomfall is out now on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Windows PC 

Start your Adventure: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/atomfall/9NC4WDL5KZBL

A single-player survival-action game inspired by real-life events, Atomfall is set five years after the Windscale nuclear disaster in Northern England.

Explore the fictional quarantine zone, scavenge, craft, barter, fight and talk your way through a British countryside setting filled with bizarre characters, mysticism, cults, and rogue government agencies.

From Rebellion, the studio behind Sniper Elite and Zombie Army, Atomfall will challenge you to solve the dark mystery of what really happened.

• Player Driven Mystery 
Unravel a tapestry of interwoven narratives through exploration, conversation, investigation, and combat, where every choice you make has consequences.

• Explore this Green and Unpleasant Land 
The picturesque British countryside, with rolling green hills, lush valleys, and rural villages belie the danger
title: Atomfall - Accessibility  Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
In Xbox’s Wake Up, directed by David Fincher and Romain Chassaing, a wonderfully off-beat fairy tale unfolds: Horatio, a rat, rekindles his humanity through the joy of gaming. We follow Horatio through a day in the rat race: a packed commute, the drudgery of the office, a rushed lunch at his desk. The mundanity is interrupted by glimpses of mysterious gamers—the only humans we see amongst the rats. After a long day, Horatio powers on his Xbox on his Samsung OLED TV and connects with his friends. A much-needed dose of fun transforms him into the human he always was.

Learn more: https://www.xbox.com/what-is-xbox

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

author: Xbox
description:
The atmospheric architectural adventure Blue Prince has finally launched on Xbox Series X|S and Windows, as well as Game Pass day 1. 

The doors to the mysterious Mount Holly Manor with its 45 shifting rooms have finally opened. Prepare to embark on a genre-defying puzzle strategy adventure, where you will draft rooms, unravel mysteries, solve puzzles, and develop architectural strategies as you try to track down the mysterious “Room 46”.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/blue-prince/9pfrtprq569q
